请先从上方选择用户组: Please select a user group from above first
尚未加入项目。项目成员才可以根据资源实例查询: Not joined the project yet. Only project members can search for resource instances
项目尚未升级到新版权限系统，点击前往旧版权限中心操作: This project has not been upgraded to the new permission system. Back to old version.
根据筛选条件，匹配到如下用户组:: According to the filter conditions, the following user groups are matched:
确认删除【】用户组？: Are you sure to delete the [{0}] user group?
删除用户组【】将执行如下操作：: Deleting user group [{0}] will perform the following operations:
将用户和组织从组中移除: Remove users and organizations from group
删除组内用户继承该组的权限: Delete users in the group inheriting the permissions of the group
删除组信息和组权限: Delete group information and group permissions
此操作提交后将不能恢复，为避免误删除，请再次确认你的操作：: After submitting this operation, {0} will be deleted. To avoid accidental deletion, please confirm your operation again:
请输入待删除的用户组名: Please enter the name of the user group to be deleted
项目尚未升级到新版权限系统，点击前往旧版权限中心申请: The project has not been upgraded to the new permission system. Go to the old permission center to apply.
有 X 个代码库正在使用此 OAUTH 授权，无法直接删除。: {0} repositories are using this OAUTH authorization and it cannot be deleted directly.
请先修改对应代码库的授权方式，或者请新的负责人重置代码库授权后重试。: Please modify the authorization method of the corresponding repositories, or ask the new owner to reset the repository authorization and try again.
刷新过程中可能会导致正在使用此 OAUTH 授权的流水线运行失败。: Refreshing might cause pipelines using this OAUTH authorization to fail.
检测到以下X项授权将无法重置，请给授权人添加Y权限或Z: Detected that the following {0} authorizations cannot be reset, please grant the authorizer {1} permission or {2}
输入授权人，输入框失焦进行校验: Enter the authorizer, validation will occur when the input box loses focus
该用户暂无项目权限: This user currently has no project permissions
该用户无操作权限，但存在授权，可前往「授权管理」查看处理: This user has no operation permissions, but there is authorization. Please go to {0} to view and handle it
确认从用户组中退出用户吗: Are you sure you want to exit the user from the user group?
确认退出以上X个用户组吗？: Are you sure you want to exit the above {0} user groups?
移交以上用户组，将导致: Transferring the above user group will cause
X个流水线权限代持失效: {0} pipeline delegation permissions to become invalid
请确认是否同步移交授权。: Please confirm whether to also transfer the authorization.
退出以上用户组，将导致: Exiting the above user group will cause
请填写交接人，完成交接后才能成功退出。: Please specify a transferee and complete the transfer before successfully exiting.
请先选择用户组: Please select a user group first
已成功提交续期申请，等待管理员或资源拥有者审批。可在我的申请中查看进度。: Renewal request submitted successfully, awaiting approval from the administrator or resource owner. Progress can be viewed in My Applications.
已成功提交移交权限申请，等待交接人确定。可在我的交接中查看进度。: Transfer request submitted successfully, waiting for the transferee's confirmation. Progress can be viewed in My Transfers.
通过用户组加入，不可直接退出。如需调整，请编辑用户组: Joined through user group, cannot exit directly. Please edit the user group for adjustments.
通过用户组获得权限，请到流水线里续期整个用户组: Permissions acquired through user group, please renew the entire user group in the pipeline.
通过用户组获得权限，请到: Permissions acquired through user group, please go to
里续期整个用户组: to renew the entire user group
通过用户组获得权限，请到用户组里退出用户: Permissions acquired through user group, please exit the user in the user group
可以尝试 调整关键词 或 清空筛选条件: You can try adjusting the keywords or {0}
输入交接人，选中回车进行有效性校验: Input the handover person, and press Enter for validity check
目标对象和交接人不允许相同。: The target and transferee cannot be the same.
完成交接后，将自动退出用户组: After completing the transfer, you will automatically exit the user group
已成功提交「移交权限」申请，等待交接人确认。: Transfer permission application submitted successfully, awaiting confirmation from the transferee.
可在“我的交接”中查看进度。: You can view progress in 'My Transfers'.
无需交接的X个用户组已成功退出。: {0} user groups that do not require transfer have successfully exited.
1. 已成功提交移交权限申请，等待交接人X确认。: 1. Transfer permission application submitted successfully, awaiting confirmation from {0}.
2. 可在“我的交接”中查看进度。: 2. You can view progress in 'My Transfers'.
3. 完成交接后，将自动退出用户组: 3. After completing the transfer, you will automatically exit the user group
你是以下X个用户组的唯一管理员，直接退出将导致对应资源无管理人，需先移交: You are the sole administrator of the following {0} user groups. Directly exiting will leave the corresponding resources without a manager, so a transfer is required first.
你是以下X条流水线权限代持人，直接退出将导致流水线运行失败，需先移交: You are the proxy for the following {0} pipeline permissions. Directly exiting will cause the pipeline to fail, so a transfer is required first.
批量退出操作尚未完成，确认放弃操作吗？: The batch exit operation is not yet complete. Are you sure you want to abandon the operation?
通过组织加入的 不允许 续期/退出/移交: Joining through organization does not allow renewal/exit/transfer
移交X个用户组权限，同时移交X个授权资源: Transfer {0} user group permissions, while transferring {1} authorized resources
请先选择交接单: Please select a handover form first
请输入审核意见，拒绝时必填: Please enter review comments, mandatory when rejecting
拒绝时，审批意见必填: When rejecting, approval comments are mandatory
已成功提交「重置授权」申请，等待交接人确认。: The Reset Authorization request has been successfully submitted, awaiting confirmation from the handover person.
唯一管理员，不可直接退出。请交接或停用项目: The sole administrator, cannot exit directly. Please hand over or deactivate the project
唯一拥有者，不可直接退出。请交接或删除资源: The sole owner, cannot exit directly. Please hand over or delete resources
此授权用于平台和代码库进行交互，涉及如下功能：: This authorization enables interaction between the platform and the code repository, involving the following features:
注册 Webhook 到代码库，用于事件触发场景: Register Webhook to the code repository for event-triggering scenarios
回写提交检测状态到代码库，用于代码库支持 checker 拦截合并请求场景: Report commit check status back to the code repository, supporting checker interception of merge requests when supported by the repository
需拥有代码库注册 Webhook 权限: Requires Webhook registration permission in the code repository
